caption: At an ice skating rink, many people were gliding on ice. Several individuals held microphones on a stage. A boy in red waved his fist at another boy, stumbled, and face-planted into a cake on a table. One boy stood within a painting. What's being narrated on the screen? A family sat around a breakfast table, eating, and then they all stood up. A woman kept talking. They gave money to two boys, who went off to school. The teacher entered and gestured for one of the boys to sit in the front row. A few boys were in the living room, watching TV.
